# QA Plan Checklist

-   [ ] Quality objectives & acceptance criteria defined (12207.Quality_Assurance)
-   [ ] QA independence defined (reporting line or reviewer separation)
-   [ ] Review types & cadence (SRS, Design, Code, Test) (15289.Plans)
-   [ ] Audit plan: CM/release audits with artifacts (10007.Audit)
-   [ ] Nonconformance workflow & escalation
-   [ ] Metrics: coverage, defects, rework; reporting cadence (12207.Measurement)
-   [ ] Records & retention (15289.Reports)
